metadata.subject: Potter, Sieur
Porcelain industry
Protectionism
Tariff
Intellectual property
metadata.title: A Messieurs les députés a l'Assemblée nationale : observations des fabricans de porcelaine & fayence du royaume, sur une adresse lue à l'Assemblée nationale : séance du seize janvier.
metadata.creator: Glot.
Glot
France. Assemblée nationale constituante (1789-1791)
Hérissant, Marie-Nicole, -1798, publisher
metadata.publisher: [Paris] : De l'impr. de Ve Herissant, rue N. Notre-Dame,
metadata.description: Signed: Glot, administrateur du département de Paris
Publication date inferred from another work by Glot (Martin & Walter, II, 15030), published in 1790, on the same subject
Challenges a request by the English entrepreneur Potter to establish a ceramics factory in l'Aisne and calls for stronger tariffs to protect the French ceramics trade
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, stained pages and cover. Title on cover page.
